summary: This is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 22, 2019. It records the inmate census for various housing units and includes verification signatures from correctional officers. The document is significant as it provides administrative evidence of the prison's population on a date close to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Squire SW
persons.context: Appears as a signing official on the Metropolitan Correctional Center count slip, verifying the inmate census.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate census was conducted and verified at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total of 776 inmates across various housing units.

keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated July 22, 2019.
It records an inmate census of 776 individuals at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The count was verified by correctional officers, including one named Squire SW.
This administrative record corresponds to the period when Jeffrey Epstein was held at the MCC prior to his death.
